d: Para un cosplay de Sherlock Holms, o simplemente un abrigo muy bonito.

seatEase.d: Cantidad de facilidad alrededor de tu trasero

pocketFlapRadius.t: Radio de la tapa del bolsillo
pocketFlapRadius.d: La cantidad por la cual se redondea la solapa del bolsillo

pocketRadius.d: La cantidad por la cual se redondea el bolsillo

buttonSpacingHorizontal.d: El espaciado horizontal de los botones, también determina la superposición del cierre frontal

lapelReduction.d: Controls how much the lapel tip goes inwards.

frontOverlap.d: Controls how much the right and left front of the garment overlap at the center front.

pocketHeight.d: Controls the height of the front pockets

pocketWidth.d: Controls the width of the front pockets

chestPocketPlacement.d: Controls the location of the chest pocket.

chestPocketAngle.d: Controls the slant of the chest pocket.

chestPocketWidth.d: Controls the width of the chest pocket.

innerPocketPlacement.d: Controls the location of the inner pocket.

innerPocketDepth.d: Controls the depth of the inner pocket.

innerPocketWidth.d: Controls the width of the inner pocket.

innerPocketWeltHeight.d: Controls the height of the inner pocket welts.

sleeveBend.d: The angle of the sleeve at the elbow.

sleevecapHeight.d: Controls the height of the sleevecap.

sleevecapEase.d: Controls the amount of sleevecap ease.

cuffLength.d: Controls the length (height if you wish) of the cuffs.

collarFlare.d: Controls the flare of the collar by altering the fall length (between the neck and the tips) of the collar.

collarSpread.d: Controls how close the collar lies to the neck.

waistEase.d: Controls the amount of ease at your waist.
